title: Trump: I'd love to see Stephen A. Smith run

description: Sen. Tim Sheehy (R-Mont.) on Wednesday joined the viral debate over who would be the victor of a hypothetical fight between 100 men and a gorilla. title: Sen. Sheehy joins viral debate over 100 men vs. a gorilla

description: House Republicans on Wednesday advanced legislation that seeks to significantly limit the funding the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) is able to access, a move Democrats say would “dismantle” the agency. The GOP-led House Financial Services Committee on Wednesday afternoon voted 32-20 along party lines to make major changes to the funding structure for the...
title: House Republicans advance 'best shot' at reining in Obama-era consumer protections
